original_title: Shocking Blue: Greatest Hits around the World
overview: 20 track anthology of the Nederlandse rock group from the 1960's who hit big around the world with the song "Venus", which was covered a generation later by the girl trio Bananarama. They released a dozen albums in their homeland, but never equalled the worldwide exposure afforded by that first hit.  Track Listings 1. Venus  2. Mighty Joe  3. Never Marry A Railroad Ma  4. Hello Darkness  5. Shocking You  6. Blossom Lady  7. Inkpot  8. Rock In The Sea  9. Send Me A Postcard  10. Long And Lones Road  11. Out Of Sight Out Of Mind  12. Oh Lord  13. This America  14. Good Times  15. Gonna Sing Me A Song  16. Love Is In The Air  17. Lucy Brown Is Back In Tow  18. Eve And The Apple  19. Let Me Carry Your Bag  20. Dream On Dreamer
title: Shocking Blue: Greatest Hits around the World
